title: Black bean and corn quesadillas
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons finely chopped onion', '1 (400g) tin black beans, drained and rinsed', '280g sweetcorn, drained', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '4 tablespoons salsa', '1/4 teaspoon chilli flakes', '2 tablespoons butter, divided', '8 flour tortillas', '175g grated mature Cheddar or Gouda']
